changeSet.comment:
The commons_ints table is used by reports/queries that need to generate all dates between two dates. Usage: -- Only works for 100 days, add more ints joins for more SELECT cal.date, tbl.data FROM ( SELECT '2009-06-25' + INTERVAL a.i * 10 + b.i DAY as date FROM ints a JOIN ints b ORDER BY a.i * 10 + b.i ) cal LEFT JOIN tbl ON cal.date = tbl.date WHERE cal.date BETWEEN '2009-06-25' AND '2009-07-01';
See: http://stackoverflow.com/a/1080334/1314
